title: Error Code 404
body: I was able to play yesterday, yet i got on this morning and league tried to apply a patch. Yet it wont go past 0%, just scans files for awhile then it gives me "Patching failed and we're not sure why. Please restart client to try patching again. (Error code 404)" I have attempted to restart my computer and the client (client several times.) On top of this since the legacy client was disbanded the new client as a whole has been glitchy. Please help, I'd rather not spend a hour reinstalling league.

replies.body:
At that point, your patcher is trying to scan the game files to see exactly what needs to be updated. If your OS doesn't have the right permission settings it can completely block the patcher from scanning and then it throws that error.

Hit up our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) if you're not sure how to adjust those settings. Once you get that done, you should be able to get the patch going!
